enabled-console-msg: Festival now enabled, English selected (adjust with /fe lang <en/nl/es/pl/fr/ru>).
cmd-ingameonly-msg: Festival command only to be used in-game.
cmd-noperms-msg: You can not use this Festival command
cmd-noperms-subcommand: You do not have permission to use this subcommand.
select-both-pos-first: Please select 2 coordinates by placing or breaking 2 positions first.
make-pos1: Please place or break the first position.
make-pos2: Please place or break position 2 to set the longest diagonal in the new cube area.
make-radius-distance: Please place or break position 2 to set the radius for new sphere area.
make-diameter-distance: Please place or break position 2 to set the diameter for new sphere area.
give-area-name: Please specify a name for this area. Use: /fe create <areaname>
in-unknown-area: You are in an unknown area
area-no-area-to-edit: There are no areas that you can edit
area-name-excist: An area with that name already exists.
whitelist-specify-action: Please specify a valid action. Use: /area whitelist <add/list/show/remove(del,delete)> <playername> for <areaname>
whitelist-specify-for-area: Please use 'for' in this command string. Use: /area whitelist <add/list/show/remove(del,delete)> <playername> for <areaname>
name-write-usage: Assign a new name. Use: /fe rename <areaname> to <..>
name-specify-area: Please specify an area to rename. Use: /fe rename <areaname> to <newname>
name-specify-to-area: Please use 'to' in this command string. Use: /fe rename <areaname> to <name>
desc-write-usage: Please write the description. Use: /fe desc <areaname> set <..>
desc-specify-area: Please specify an area to edit the description. Use: /fe desc <areaname> set <desc>
desc-specify-set-area: Please use 'set' in this command string. Use: /fe desc <areaname> set <desc>
priority-specify-set-area: Please use 'set' in this command string. Use: /fe priority <areaname> set <number 0-999>
priority-write-usage: Please assign a number. Use: /fe priority <areaname> set <number int 0-999>
priority-number-usage: Please assign a number, 0 is default, 1 - 999 assigns higher priority. Use: /fe priority <areaname> set <number int 0-999>
priority-specify-area: Please specify an area to edit the priority. Use: /fe priority <areaname> set <number int 0-999>
scaling-specify-set-area: Please use 'up'(top) or 'down'(bottom) in this command string. Use: /fe scale <areaname> <up/down> <number 0-9999>
scaling-write-usage: Please assign a number. Use: /fe scale <areaname> <up/down> <number int 0-9999>
scaling-number-usage: Please assign a number, 0 is default, 1 - 9998 assigns scaling, 9999 is unlimited. Use: /fe scale <areaname> <up/down> <number int 0-9999>
scaling-specify-area: Please specify an area to edit the scaling (top/bottom). Use: /fe scale <areaname> <up/down> <number int 0-9999>
specify-to-delete: Please specify an area to delete.
flag-not-found-list: Flag not found. (Flag names: hurt, pvp, flight, edit, touch, animals, mobs, effect, msg, pass, drop, tnt, shoot, hunger, perms, fall)
flag-not-specified-list: Please specify a flag. Usage /fe <flagname> <areaname> (Flag names: hurt, pvp, flight, edit, touch, animals, mobs, effect, msg, pass, drop, tnt, shoot, hunger, perms, fall)
specify-to-flag: Please specify the area you would like to flag.
specify-excisting-area-name: Please specify an existing Area name. (Info: /fe list)
edit-id-or-other: , edit this id or use another id
cmd-specify-id-and-command-usage: Please specify the command ID and command string to add. Use: /fe command <areaname> <add(enter/center/leave)/list/edit/del> <COMMANDID> <COMMANDSTRING>
cmd-valid-areaname: Area not found, please submit a valid name. Use: /fe command <areaname> <add(enter/center/leave)/list/edit/del> <commandID> <commandstring>.
cmd-id-not-found: Command ID not found. See the commands with /fe command <areaname> list'
cmd-specify-id-to-delete: Please specify the command ID to delete. Usage /fe command <areaname> del <COMMANDID>
cmd-specify-action: Please add an action to perform with command.  Usage: /fe command <areaname> <add/list/edit/del> <commandID> <commandstring>.
all-players-are-save: All players are save in this Area!
no-pvp-area: You are in a No-PVP Area!
option-missing-in-config: option missing in config.yml, now set to
flag-missing-in-config: flag defaults missing, now set to
barrier-is-passage-flag: Old Barrier config was used, now set to 'false'; please rename 'Barrier' to 'Passage' in config.yml
no-is-falldamage-flag: Old NoFalldamage config was used, now set to 'false'; please rename 'NoFalldamage' to 'Falldamage' in config.yml
compass-dir-wsp: Compass direction set to world spawn point
compass-dir-notset: Direction could not be set on compass
ui-compass-not-found: Selected area could not be found
ui-cmd-id-not-found: Command ID not found! Try again or select another option
ui-cmd-empty-not-saved: Command empty and not saved! Try again or select another option
ui-make-sphere-radius: Sphere Radius - select center and radius distance
ui-tab-pos1-diagonal: Tab the first diagonal position for new cube area
ui-tab-pos1-radius: Tab the center position for the new sphere area
ui-tab-pos1-diameter: Tab the first diameter position for the new sphere area
ui-formdate-not-available-try-again: Form data corrupted or not available, please try again.
ui-areaname-allready-used-try-again: New area name not correct or allready used. Please try another name:
ui-gonna-delete-area: You are going to delete area
